title: Bg. 11.18
sanskrit: त्वमक्षरं परमं वेदितव्यंत्वमस्य विश्वस्य परं निधानम् ।त्वमव्यय: शाश्वतधर्मगोप्‍तासनातनस्त्वं पुरुषो मतो मे ॥ १८ ॥
transliteration: tvam akṣaraṁ paramaṁ veditavyaṁtvam asya viśvasya paraṁ nidhānamtvam avyayaḥ śāśvata-dharma-goptāsanātanas tvaṁ puruṣo mato me
literary_trans: You are the supreme primal objective. You are the ultimate resting place of all this universe. You are inexhaustible, and You are the oldest. You are the maintainer of the eternal religion, the Personality of Godhead. This is my opinion.You are the supreme primal objective. You are the ultimate resting place of all this universe. You are inexhaustible, and You are the oldest. You are the maintainer of the eternal religion, the Personality of Godhead. This is my opinion.
